content.title: Intro
content.content:
2003 Lord of the Rings Calendar was produced by the Italian Tolkien Society with illustrations by Mark Addamiano. The calendar was printed in linoleumgrafica in black and white, limited to only 150 copies. 8 pages total including the front and back covers. Bound by a cord.

Dimensions: 8 1/4 x 11 3/4 inches
